name: Age of Fear 3: The Legend
description: Play as either Nairi, an imprisoned Dryad fighting for her freedom, or Gilrock, a drunken Dwarven Lord on a quest to restore his family's honour (or just to kick some arse!). The Age of Fear series is a deep and complex turn-based strategy (full of humour!) that fuses a tabletop wargame with RPG elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL capable Storage: 5 GB available space
